title: Undo/Redo System

criteria.text: undo.rs exists with UndoStack and UndoCommand types
criteria.notes: Created with full doc comments and unit tests

criteria.text: UndoCommand has variants for canvas (AddOutline, RemoveOutline, ModifyOutline), extrude (ChangeExtrudeParams), sculpt (MeshSnapshot), and paint (VertexColors) operations
criteria.notes: All 6 variants implemented with UndoVertex struct for MeshSnapshot

criteria.text: Stack enforces maximum of 50 operations, dropping oldest when exceeded
criteria.notes: MAX_UNDO_SIZE=50, oldest entries dropped via drain(0..excess)

criteria.text: push() truncates redo history when a new command is pushed after undo
undo() returns the command to reverse and decrements cursor position
redo() returns the command to reapply and increments cursor position
can_undo() and can_redo() correctly report availability
criteria.notes: cursor > 0 for undo, cursor < len for redo

criteria.text: Ctrl+Z triggers undo in battle_editor.rs keyboard handling
criteria.notes: ctrl_held bool tracks ControlLeft/ControlRight, KeyZ when ctrl_held calls undo()

criteria.text: Ctrl+Y triggers redo in battle_editor.rs keyboard handling

checklist.item: Create src/game/asset_editor/undo.rs with UndoStack and UndoCommand types
Implement push() with redo truncation and max size enforcement
Implement undo() and redo() with cursor management
Add apply_undo and apply_redo functions for each UndoCommand variant
Wire Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y into battle_editor.rs keyboard handler
Run cargo check --bin battle_editor and cargo check --bin battle_arena

worker_notes: Implemented command-based undo/redo system. UndoStack uses cursor-based approach: commands[0..cursor] are undoable, commands[cursor..len] are redoable. push() truncates redo history then enforces max_size=50. Ctrl modifier tracked via ctrl_held bool in BattleEditorApp, following the same pattern used in battle_arena.rs.
learnings: winit 0.30 tracks key codes via PhysicalKey::Code(KeyCode), modifier state must be tracked manually with a bool field
battle_arena.rs already uses ctrl_held pattern for Ctrl+Z/Y/C/V shortcuts - followed same approach for consistency
